name: FiltererBlockUpdate
description: The `FiltererBlockUpdate` class is an event filterer specifically designed for filtering `BlockUpdate` events in JSMacros. It allows you to create sophisticated filtering conditions based on block position, type, state, and update type, enabling precise control over when your block update event handlers should execute.
overview: FiltererBlockUpdate implements the `EventFilterer` interface and provides a fluent API for building complex filters for block-related events. This filterer is automatically associated with the `BlockUpdate` event through the `@Event` annotation on `EventBlockUpdate`.

methods.name: setPos
methods.description: Sets a single block position to filter for.

methods.name: setPos
methods.description: Sets a single block position to filter for using a BlockPosHelper.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: Block position object, or null to clear position filter

methods.name: setArea
methods.signature: setArea(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)
methods.description: Sets a cuboid area to filter for using coordinates. The method automatically normalizes coordinates, so corner order doesn't matter.

methods.name: setArea
methods.description: Sets a cuboid area to filter for using BlockPosHelper objects.

methods.name: setBlockId
methods.description: Sets the block ID to filter for.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Block ID in namespace format (e.g., "minecraft:stone"), or null to clear

methods.name: setUpdateType
methods.description: Sets the block update type to filter for.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Update type: "STATE" for block state changes, "ENTITY" for block entity changes, or null to clear

methods.name: setBlockStates
methods.description: Sets multiple block state properties to filter for.

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: Map of property names to values, or null to clear

methods.name: setBlockState
methods.description: Sets a single block state property to filter for.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The property value, or null to ensure the block doesn't have this property
